评论详情: I love this blouse so much I want it in several colors! It suits my romantic, fantasy/historic/medieval/Celtic vibe. And it fits really nicely! (Note - my top half needs a larger size than my lower half, usually a Women's 0X or 1X) and this blouse fits loosely and flatters my figure while hiding my belly).  Lots of compliments when I wore it for my family reunion after Christmas.
The shirt was pretty, but the smell was intolerable! It had an overpowering chemical smell that didn't seem like it would even be slightly affected by thorough washings! Yuck!

I ordered it for my costume, but it's a lovely fall top! It had a slight wood smoke smell when it arrived that was actually pleasant. The scent dissipated pretty quickly. I wash it on gentle cycle and hang to dry. No shrinkage and no ironing required! I could probably have worn one size down, but it adjusts with the back tie and I love how it blouses with my sword belt. Whether for costume or just pretty, comfortable fall wear, this top is a winner!

This - Renaissance Tunic Bohemian style blouse is comfortable, and fabric is soft.  seems to be well made. Fabric is just right for fall weather i even got a compliment on it and wanted to know where i got it. I may buy more of these shirts.I got the teal color, very pretty.
Perfect top for a Stevie Nicks concert!
Quality fabric, quality workmanship

OK absolutely love this top. Whenever I have worn it, everybody asked where I got it and in my opinion, it looks much more expensive than it was. The quality was great. The fit was very flattering. The color is a really stunning emerald. There’s no elasticity, but I didn’t want that in a shirt like this it’s a true cotton Boho blouse.

Very pretty blouse. Fit well. Funny smell that is typical with clothing dyed  with these types of dyes, but if they're soaked in cold water with some vinegar added, it neutralizes the off- odor. Hang to dry for no shrinkage, but label says dry clean.

评论概述: Dye drips off shirt when wet
评论详情: The style is pretty. Fits well, but the blue dye stains everything if the shirt gets wet
Ya'll, I couldn't wait to wear this when it came it. Beautifully soft fabric, very flowy. Love the sleeves. Flattering.

I was making my bed when Amazon Man arrived and I couldn't wait to try it on and show you. Anyway, I love everything about this top. Great cover-up for the dreaded post baby or postmenopausal bulges. I like that the bottom of the sleeves are slit so that the angled end doesn't dip in your soup. The image shows the top loose without the back ties secured. I'm 5'1", 162 lbs., 36D, apple shaped.

评论用户: Do Not buy this dangerous piece of crap. I plugged it in, the blower would not turn on but the heater burned up started smoking
评论详情: I am 5”3 and 165 I am a 36D and had to wear a minimizer bra to even get it over the girls. It fit awkwardly.

评论概述: THE MOST PRETTIEST TOP IVE EVER BOUGHT
评论详情: I’m 167 pounds and I got the XL in black. I was scared it wasn’t gonna fit me but it fits so perfectly. It’s not too baggy and it’s not tight at all. Fits like a damn glove. The material is so soft and it feels so nice and breathable. I feel like a gothic witch and I’m living for it. Definitely buy this shirt. Time to go frolic around in the cemetery!!
I wore this blouse as part of an outfit to a Stevie Nicks concert. It matched perfectly with all the items I purchased! I loved it.

This blouse was cute and actually fit.  But washings don't get the petroleum smell out of it.  I can't possibly wear it.  Unfortunately it can't be returned if the package is opened and/or tags are removed.  How do you know if it smells or fits without opening the package?  Or wash without removing the tag? Very disappointing and a a loss of $40.  Buyer beware!
too big, but made well. bought small, would need xxs!
Love the shirt

评论概述: LOVE LOVE! COLOR is not as pictured- RUST not RED
评论详情: Beautifully made. Did not shrink, but does bleed for the first few washes, so wash alone at first. Color is NOT RED. It is RUST. A little disappointing, but not enough to return. I am pairing with a chocolate brown pant for the Fall, as there are hints of brown in the fabric. Also pops paired with black. Lots of compliments. The bell sleeves feel pretty and feminine. Lovely blouse!

评论概述: very attractive and the fir is very flattering
评论详情: love the color and style. I purchased it to wear to a Mexican Fiesta party but can't wait to wear it other places
Awesome shirt and looks great fit as expected

Product bled and shrunk in the wash.  I wasn't surprised, I knew this was likely to happen.  It shrunk more than I was expecting.  But the reason I removed 2 stars is that it ripped on first wearing.  And it appears it was sewed before dying, as the rip shows bright white.  Luckily I keep my sewing machine ready and was able to sew it back, but I'm a bit disappointed it ripped so easily.Plus I got the largest size possible, and it's tight.  That's not highly surprising, but this does run small.

I've ordered several tops from Agan Traders. I ordered the red and I love the "dusty-muted" shade. The bell sleeves, exquisite embroidery, really makes this a Renaissance era  top. But the silkened V-panel just sent this top to soaring heights! I love the tie back feature for body shaping. I originally order Large (my usual size) but here of late Agan's sizings seem a little off. I returned it for an XL, but they were out of stock.  So  I got a 2X, especially since reviewers say they shrink a bit (which is par for the course with Rayon). Ladies Please do yourselves a favor HAND wash in COLD WATER with Woolite and hang dry. (or dry clean). I bought my first Agan top 15 years ago and with the hand washings,  it's STILL as good as new!.
Pretty but stinky
One of the most flattering blouses I own. So soft and fit is amazing. Will be buying more from this company
I was looking for a top to wear to a medieval themed baby shower. This looked amazing, was really soft, and fit really well. I received a lot of compliments on the top.

评论概述: Beautiful top, but what is that odor?
评论详情: I can't figure out the stench. That's not the first time I've gotten clothing that has a weird stench. It kind of goes away after you hand wash it and air dry. After a couple of hand washes you should be good to go.
I love this top. Only thing is it runs large. I’m returning it for a smaller size.
It made my girlfriend happy so it made me happy!

评论概述: I ordered a small, & it’s a little big, I don’t know if it will shrink.

These are gorgeous! Fit well, super comfy material. I love these so much I've bought the blue one also but would love all of them. :)
I ordered over sized for my belly and I'm glad I did. The stitching is beautiful.
A little smelly from the dye
Not as described, sizing is way off. have to pay for return shipping...

Firstly, I am 5'8", 165 lbs, measurements are 36", 30", 42".I am broad shouldered and have a long torso.Wish this fit me, as Amazon recommended I order a size L (they were wrong).Can't return this, and can't afford to order another one.  Promise it's so beautiful though.  🥺Personally, it fits very snug in the arms and upper torso, so it restricts some movement.  Also, its not as long as I anticipated.  Wouldn't be able to wear this with leggings.If you're like me, recommend that you go up a size or two.  Otherwise it is just so beautiful and detailed.I got the turquoise, and as another reviewer stated, the pictures don't do it justice.  The fabric and quality is top notch.  💕

It is hard to judge size so when I bought these two I took a larger size trying to be safe.  I could have gone 2 sizes down but they are so lovely,  I wear them anyway.  The colors are gorgeous once on and a versatile.
Love
Very nice blouse All mentioned above…..flattering & comfortable!
I feel absolutely regal in this blouse. I love Argan traders and supporting the incredible artists who make these traditional style garments.

I really like this Gypsy blouse. It reminds me of the old school "hippie" clothes, but extremely stylish and the fit was perfect. I was not disappointed. It was great to put it on and have it fit with a tailored look instead of a sloppy shirt. I definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to feel like Stevie Nicks!
Great doing business
One of my favorite tops. Line dry and iron to keep it in good condition.
I never received this item. I asked about it twice,and never received a reply. I love the shirts, but this was aggravating.
What a beautiful color.  Great style.  Quality fabric and workmanship.  Extremely happy with this blouse.
It was a little wrinkled due to the packaging, but otherwise , perfect.

My hubby bought 4blouses from this company for my birthday.  They are wonderful!  The colors are vibrant, they are well made and they fit as expected.  I will definitely be getting more items from them!

Lovely material and perfect fit!
I shipped it to my daughter. She said she absolutely loved it! Thank You!
It looks pretty but it stinks to high heaven!!  I don’t know if I can get the smell out.  Going to wash it tomorrow.After washing and wearing it twice, it started coming apart.  Very disappointed!

Have received lots of compliments on this top.  Its fits perfectly, I'm a 36DD and selected a large.  My waist is quite small and the ties in the back of the tunic helps to make it look fitted.  Will be purchasing in other colours
The blouse is beautiful!  Fits well & workmanship is very pretty & the color is vibrant.

This was beautiful until I washed it in cold water and hung it to dry. The dye leached out and left an uneven light blue color with teal streaks. I may wash it again and see if the streaks will come out. Maybe I'll have a solid faded blue then.
Very beautiful. Fits well. Love the tie straps.
I am 5’9, 245 lbs with a 40 DD chest, and the 2xl fits PERFECTLY! The quality is amazing and the color is gorgeous! Love love love it!
True to size. Really well made. Nice material. Beautiful color. I would buy again.

This top is GLORIOUS! The fabric is soft and beautiful, the detail is exquisite, the fit is good. I can't wait to wear it to something special. It is a little pricier than what I normally purchase for casual wear, but I will be getting another color or two in the near future. It's THAT amazing!
Unfortunately, the sleeves were just a tad too long, and the tie in back makes it look like something for someone much younger.

This blouse fit well because I bought it one size bigger than I usually wear. The satin in the middle creates a nice line. The embroidery is of fine quality and the sleeves are marvelous. If it was not so expensive, I would buy a second.
Beautiful product! I have received compliments every time I wear it. The material is very soft and comfortable to wear. The bell sleeves are large. No housework while wearing this shirt.
The fit was terrible, and it didn't look so great after it was washed.

I absolutely love the color of this top. It is much more subdued in person than the photos show. The workmanship is superior. I was concerned that the arms might be too tight on my massive biceps but there is plenty of room to move freely. There are also slits in the bottom of the sleeve above the wrists, that let you move easily. I am pleasantly surprised with this beautiful top. I will definitely order from this supplier again.

Gorgeous detailed embroidery and very light material that looks like a denim... hard to describe. I ordered a 2X even though I wear an XL, since some of these type Bohemian tunic type tops do run a tad small.  I would say these definitely are true to size and I’ll be returning this (Silver Gray) gorgeous top that looks EXACTLY as pictured but even prettier. Perfect for The Rolling Stones concert in just 3 weeks🤩😎 I’ve been looking for weeks for the exact style and had no luck until... this. It’s perfect.  Reordering XL in Purple.  My husband thinks the silver is too light with my blonde hair🥰 he’s right... purple is great with my coloring.. I HIGHLY recommend this flowing bohemian gypsy top ... can’t wait and I’ll be getting 2 more colors later on.  5 ⭐️
The material is soft, the fit is great, color wonderful-it makes me feel so pretty!
Beautiful.
Love this shirt so pretty & comfy!

I absolutely love this shirt. Although, it looks beautiful in the picture, it looks a million times better on. I purchased the shirt in old gold, and the color is gorgeous. I weigh 120lbs, and am 5ft 2in. I ordered the shirt in a small, and it does run a little big, so I would recommend ordering a size down, if possible. There are ties which allow for tightening, which is awesome. I would definitely recommend buying this shirt. You will not regret it!

makes some beautiful clothes at prices you can't find at the retail stores. The material is exquisite and the quality is great. Just follow the sizing chart and you'll be happy when you get your package

great shirt wore it for a renaissance dress up. 评论概述: Two stars because of the shipping and return! It didn't work for me.
评论详情: I gave this two stars because the shipping was fast and the return was easy.  I was refunded immediately once the shipping label was tracked. It was really quite a different shirt and it smelled bad and I have never smelled the odor before.  I would definitely wear this in a middle eastern country but it just didn't really fit in where I live.  I felt odd in it and I cannot explain why.  Also, the neckline is really high almost like that piece of material in the front needed to be removed.  If I was going to keep the shirt I would have ordered another color because the blue color was a bit strange...not like the pic and I would cut out the front piece.  Maybe then it would be ok but for that price I am not going to take the chance and order again.  I sent it back.

This shirt fits US sizes. It is a pretty shirt.

评论概述: The other three I LOVE, but with this one I'm disappointed
评论详情: This is the fourth blouse I've purchased from Agan Traders.  The other three I LOVE, but with this one I'm disappointed.  I purchased the Red / Burgundy version of this blouse and love the fit.  Purchased this one, the same blouse, same size, etc in green and immediately noticed when I put it on it doesn't seem to have the same coverage as my burgundy one.  When held up together, the green one is 2-3 inches shorter in length through the torso than the burgundy one, and doesn't have nearly the waist/butt coverage.  I doubt I'll ever wear this one due to the fit.  I'm not sure if my burgundy one is longer than it was supposed to be, or the green one is shorter, and it makes me hesitant to order more without being able to actually try them on first (I had planned to order the other ones I've already gotten in different colors).  Otherwise, this is another very pretty blouse, with the same construction quality I've come to expect from Agan.  I'm doing a 3 star rating because overall I do love the Agan Trader blouses, just not this specific one.
It's an interesting and pretty design, but it was a frayed, tangled mess after one washing.

What an Eye catcher! I LOVE this top! Have had so many compliments on it. I got the rust which is gorgeous!  The detail and quality is outstanding. Have not washed it yet. I took a chance and got the S since that was the only size available in the rust and it fits perfectly. Love the tie back to cinch it up too. I am 5'3" and 125 with a 36C bust if that helps you. Such a great hippie/bohemian top!
